action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Brussels
BY: Plane
CLASS: Business
WHEN: In May

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your origin? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the travel agent is aware of the origin of the trip being London.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the travel agent is aware of the origin of the trip, which is London.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the travel agent is aware of the origin of the trip, which is London.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the travel agent is aware of the origin of the trip, which is London.

ANSWER: Yes, the travel agent is aware of the origin of the travel from London.
